message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it will be very valuable for you.  Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I agree the product looks great, $20,000 is a bit outside my budget.  Would you consider $12,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While I understand your budget constraints, $12,000 is significantly below its value.  Could you do $17,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. $17,000 is still a bit high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $14,500?
